title: Advancements in removing common antibiotics from wastewater using nano zero valent iron
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26272-26291
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04336G, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shuxian Wei, Chuan He, Lanyue Zhang, Canhua Li, Jiamao Li, Gang DU
The article summarizes the modification effects of different loads on nZVI, as well as the preparation methods for nZVI particles and their effects and mechanisms in commonly used antibiotic contaminated environments.
